# Draft:Nasiruddin Patwary

----
Nasiruddin Patwary (Bengali: নাসিরুদ্দিন পাটোয়ারী) is a Bangladeshi politician. He is the convener of the Jatiya Nagorik Committee and chief coordinator of the National Citizen Party-NCP.
Poitical life
Nasir has been involved in student politics since his student life. He is currently serving as the Convener of the National Citizen Committee and the Chief Coordinator of the National Citizen Party.
Controversial activities
Patwari made controversial comments while criticizing the central leaders of Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP), a major political party in Bangladesh.
BNP leader Salahuddin made controversial comments about him at a roadshow organized by his party in the tourist district of Cox's Bazar in Bangladesh, and later BNP leaders and activists started protests in Cox's Bazar.
Nasir made controversial comments about the interim government's announcement of national elections in Bangladesh, which was widely criticized across the country.
He faced criticism for visiting Cox's Bazar despite party decisions.
He faced criticism for making controversial comments about BNP leader Lutfar Rahman Babar.
